title: Update floral icon asset + transparent global header branding area

requirements.summary: Replace the generated floral icon asset with a newly extracted, tightly-cropped transparent PNG while keeping all existing image references unchanged so header/footer update automatically.
acceptanceCriteria: A new transparent PNG icon is produced from the uploaded image and saved as frontend/public/assets/generated/aurelie-icon-transparent.dim_512x512.png (replacing the prior version).
The icon has a tightly-cropped bounding box around the floral mark (no visible beige background).
Header and footer both display the updated icon automatically (no broken image links).

file_operations.description: Replace this existing generated asset with a new transparent PNG extracted from the uploaded source image (1770214375269~2.png), ensuring tight crop around the floral mark and fully transparent background; keep the same filename/path to avoid changing any references.

requirements.summary: Make the global header fully transparent and remove any button/background styling behind the brand (icon/wordmark) while preserving sticky + scroll-compress behavior and homepage navigation on brand click.
acceptanceCriteria: The header background renders as fully transparent at rest and while scrolled (no ivory fill, no backdrop tint).
The brand/logo click target does NOT render any button background/gradient/shimmer behind the icon/wordmark (it appears visually transparent).
The header remains sticky and continues to compress from h-20 to h-16 on scroll exactly as before.
Navigation buttons (Cart/Dashboard/Admin/Login/Logout) retain their current appearance and behavior.

file_operations.description: Update the header container styling to remove opaque/background and backdrop tint so it renders fully transparent while keeping the existing sticky positioning and scroll-based height compression; also update the brand click target styling (currently a button) to neutralize any global button background/shimmer so the icon/wordmark area is visually transparent while remaining clickable and navigating to '/'.

Add/adjust a dedicated utility class for the header brand click target that overrides the global button shimmer/background/text-shadow rules (and any descendant styling) so the brand area can be a visually transparent click target without affecting the existing navigation button styling.
